verses.verse: וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> ve-'Al on הַחֲתוּמִ֑ים <WH2856> ha-cha-tu-Mim; Now those that sealed נְחֶמְיָ֧ה <WH5166> ne-chem-Yah [were] Nehemiah הַתִּרְשָׁ֛תָא <WH8660> hat-tir-Sha-ta the Tirshatha בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son חֲכַלְיָ֖ה <WH2446> cha-chal-Yah of Hachaliah וְצִדְקִיָּֽה׃ <WH6667> ve-tzid-ki-Yah. and Zidkijah
שְׂרָיָ֥ה <WH8304> se-ra-Yah Seraiah עֲזַרְיָ֖ה <WH5838> 'a-zar-Yah Azariah יִרְמְיָֽה׃ <WH3414> yir-me-Yah. Jeremiah
פַּשְׁח֥וּר <WH6583> pash-Chur Pashur אֲמַרְיָ֖ה <WH568> 'a-mar-Yah Amariah מַלְכִּיָּֽה׃ <WH4441> mal-ki-Yah. Malchijah
חַטּ֥וּשׁ <WH2407> chat-Tush Hattush שְׁבַנְיָ֖ה <WH7645> she-van-Yah Shebaniah מַלּֽוּךְ׃ <WH4409> mal-Luch. Malluch
חָרִ֥ם <WH2766> cha-Rim Harim מְרֵמ֖וֹת <WH4822> me-re-Mot Meremoth עֹֽבַדְיָֽה׃ <WH5662> oad-Yah. Obadiah
דָּנִיֵּ֥אל <WH1840> da-ni-Yel Daniel גִּנְּת֖וֹן <WH1599> gin-ne-Ton Ginnethon בָּרֽוּךְ׃ <WH1263> ba-Ruch. Baruch
מְשֻׁלָּ֥ם <WH4918> me-shul-Lam Meshullam אֲבִיָּ֖ה <WH29> 'a-vi-Yah Abijah מִיָּמִֽן׃ <WH4326> mi-ya-Min. Mijamin

מַֽעַזְיָ֥ה <WH4590> ma-'az-Yah Maaziah בִלְגַּ֖י <WH1084> vil-Gai Bilgai שְׁמַֽעְיָ֑ה <WH8098> she-ma'-Yah; Shemaiah אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These הַכֹּהֲנִֽים׃ <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim. these [were] the priests ס sa-Mek

וְֽהַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> ve-hal-vi-Yim; And the Levites וְיֵשׁ֙וּעַ֙ <WH3442> ve-ye-Shu-a' both Jeshua בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֲזַנְיָ֔ה <WH245> 'a-zan-Yah, of Azaniah בִּנּ֕וּי <WH1131> bin-Nui Binnui מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> mib-be-Nei of the sons חֵנָדָ֖ד <WH2582> che-na-Dad of Henadad קַדְמִיאֵֽל׃ <WH6934> kad-mi-'El. Kadmiel

וַאֲחֵיהֶ֑ם <WH251> va-'a-chei-Hem; And their brethren שְׁבַנְיָ֧ה <WH7645> she-van-Yah Shebaniah הֽוֹדִיָּ֛ה <WH1940> ho-di-Yah Hodiah קְלִיטָ֖א <WH7042> ke-li-Ta Kelita פְּלָאיָ֥ה <WH6411> pe-la-Yah Pelaiah חָנָֽן׃ <WH2605> cha-Nan. Hanan
מִיכָ֥א <WH4316> mi-Cha Micha רְח֖וֹב <WH7340> re-Chov Rehob חֲשַׁבְיָֽה׃ <WH2811> cha-shav-Yah. Hashabiah
זַכּ֥וּר <WH2139> zak-Kur Zaccur שֵׁרֵֽבְיָ֖ה <WH8274> she-re-ve-Yah Sherebiah שְׁבַנְיָֽה׃ <WH7645> she-van-Yah. Shebaniah
הוֹדִיָּ֥ה <WH1940> ho-di-Yah Hodiah בָנִ֖י <WH1137> va-Ni Bani בְּנִֽינוּ׃ <WH1148> be-Ni-nu. Beninu ס sa-Mek

רָאשֵׁ֖י <WH7218> ra-Shei The chief הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> ha-'Am; of the people פַּרְעֹשׁ֙ <WH6551> par-'Osh Parosh פַּחַ֣ת pa-Chat מוֹאָ֔ב <WH6355> mo-'Av, Pahathmoab עֵילָ֥ם <WH5867> 'ei-Lam Elam זַתּ֖וּא <WH2240> zat-Tu Zatthu בָּנִֽי׃ <WH1137> ba-Ni. Bani
בֻּנִּ֥י <WH1138> bun-Ni Bunni עַזְגָּ֖ד <WH5803> 'az-Gad Azgad בֵּבָֽי׃ <WH893> be-Vai. Bebai
אֲדֹנִיָּ֥ה <WH138> 'a-do-ni-Yah Adonijah בִגְוַ֖י <WH902> vig-Vai Bigvai עָדִֽין׃ <WH5720> 'a-Din. Adin
אָטֵ֥ר <WH333> 'a-Ter Ater חִזְקִיָּ֖ה <WH2396> chiz-ki-Yah Hizkijah עַזּֽוּר׃ <WH5809> 'az-Zur. Azzur
הוֹדִיָּ֥ה <WH1940> ho-di-Yah Hodiah חָשֻׁ֖ם <WH2828> cha-Shum Hashum בֵּצָֽי׃ <WH1209> be-Tzai. Bezai
חָרִ֥יף <WH2756> cha-Rif Hariph עֲנָת֖וֹת <WH6068> a-na-Tot Anathoth; נֹובָי noai כנֵיבָֽי׃ <WH5109> nei-Vai. Nebai ק
מַגְפִּיעָ֥שׁ <WH4047> mag-pi-'Ash Magpiash מְשֻׁלָּ֖ם <WH4918> me-shul-Lam Meshullam חֵזִֽיר׃ <WH2387> che-Zir. Hezir
מְשֵׁיזַבְאֵ֥ל <WH4898> me-shei-zav-'El Meshezabeel צָד֖וֹק <WH6659> tza-Dok Zadok יַדּֽוּעַ׃ <WH3037> yad-Du-a'. Jaddua
פְּלַטְיָ֥ה <WH6410> pe-lat-Yah Pelatiah חָנָ֖ן <WH2605> cha-Nan Hanan עֲנָיָֽה׃ <WH6043> 'a-na-Yah. Anaiah
הוֹשֵׁ֥עַ <WH1954> ho-She-a' Hoshea חֲנַנְיָ֖ה <WH2608> cha-nan-Yah Hananiah חַשּֽׁוּב׃ <WH2815> chash-Shuv. Hashub
הַלּוֹחֵ֥שׁ <WH3873> hal-lo-Chesh Hallohesh פִּלְחָ֖א <WH6401> pil-Cha Pileha שׁוֹבֵֽק׃ <WH7733> sho-Vek. Shobek
רְח֥וּם <WH7348> re-Chum Rehum חֲשַׁבְנָ֖ה <WH2812> cha-shav-Nah Hashabnah מַעֲשֵׂיָֽה׃ <WH4641> ma-'a-se-Yah. Maaseiah
וַאֲחִיָּ֥ה <WH281> va-'a-chi-Yah And Ahijah חָנָ֖ן <WH2605> cha-Nan Hanan עָנָֽן׃ <WH6052> 'a-Nan. Anan
מַלּ֥וּךְ <WH4409> mal-Luch Malluch חָרִ֖ם <WH2766> cha-Rim Harim בַּעֲנָֽה׃ <WH1196> ba-'a-Nah. Baanah

וּשְׁאָ֣ר <WH7605> u-she-'Ar And the rest הָעָ֡ם <WH5971> ha-'Am of the people הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim the priests הַ֠לְוִיִּם <WH3881> Hal-vi-yim the Levites הַשּׁוֹעֲרִ֨ים <WH7778> hash-sho-'a-Rim the porters הַמְשֹׁרְרִ֜ים <WH7891> ham-sho-re-Rim the singers הַנְּתִינִ֗ים <WH5411> han-ne-ti-Nim, the Nethinims וְֽכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all הַנִּבְדָּ֞ל <WH914> han-niv-Dal and all they that had separated מֵעַמֵּ֤י <WH5971> me-'am-Mei themselves from the people הָאֲרָצוֹת֙ <WH776> ha-'a-ra-tzOt of the lands אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to תּוֹרַ֣ת <WH8451> to-Rat unto the law הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God נְשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <WH802> ne-shei-Hem their wives בְּנֵיהֶ֣ם <WH1121> be-nei-Hem their sons וּבְנֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <WH1323> u-ve-no-tei-Hem; and their daughters כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> kol all יוֹדֵ֥עַ <WH3045> yo-De-a' every one having knowledge מֵבִֽין׃ <WH995> me-Vin. and having understanding

מַחֲזִיקִ֣ים <WH2388> ma-cha-zi-Kim They clave עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- with אֲחֵיהֶם֮ <WH251> 'a-chei-Hem to their brethren אַדִּירֵיהֶם֒ <WH117> 'ad-di-rei-Hem their nobles וּבָאִ֞ים <WH935> u-va-'Im and entered בְּאָלָ֣ה <WH423> be-'a-Lah into a curse וּבִשְׁבוּעָ֗ה <WH7621> u-vish-vu-'Ah, and into an oath לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <WH1980> la-Le-chet to walk בְּתוֹרַ֣ת <WH8451> be-to-Rat law הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, in God's אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נִתְּנָ֔ה <WH5414> nit-te-Nah, which was given בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> be-Yad by מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <WH5650> 'e-ved- the servant הָֽאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him; of God וְלִשְׁמ֣וֹר <WH8104> ve-lish-Mor and to observe וְלַעֲשׂ֗וֹת <WH6213> ve-la-'a-Sot, and do אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all מִצְוֹת֙ <WH4687> mitz-Vot all the commandments יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֲדֹנֵ֔ינוּ <WH136> 'a-do-Nei-nu, our Lord וּמִשְׁפָּטָ֖יו <WH4941> u-mish-pa-Tav and his judgments וְחֻקָּֽיו׃ <WH2706> ve-chuk-Kav. and his statutes

וַאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> va-'a-Sher after לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- we will not נִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> nit-Ten And that we would not give בְּנֹתֵ֖ינוּ <WH1323> be-no-Tei-nu our daughters לְעַמֵּ֣י <WH5971> le-'am-Mei unto the people הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; of the land וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בְּנֹ֣תֵיהֶ֔ם <WH1323> be-No-tei-Hem, their daughters לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo or נִקַּ֖ח <WH3947> nik-Kach nor take לְבָנֵֽינוּ׃ <WH1121> le-va-Nei-nu. for our sons

וְעַמֵּ֣י <WH5971> ve-'am-Mei And [if] the people הָאָ֡רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz of the land הַֽמְבִיאִים֩ <WH935> ham-vi-'Im bring אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמַּקָּח֨וֹת <WH4728> ham-mak-ka-Chot ware וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol any שֶׁ֜בֶר <WH7668> She-ver or any victuals בְּי֤וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom day הַשַּׁבָּת֙ <WH7676> hash-shab-Bat on the sabbath לִמְכּ֔וֹר <WH4376> lim-Kor, to sell לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- we will not נִקַּ֥ח <WH3947> nik-Kach [that] we would not buy מֵהֶ֛ם <WH1992> me-Hem like בַּשַּׁבָּ֖ת <WH7676> bash-shab-Bat it of them on the sabbath וּבְי֣וֹם <WH3117> u-ve-Yom day קֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> Ko-desh; or on the holy וְנִטֹּ֛שׁ <WH5203> ve-nit-Tosh and [that] we would leave אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַשָּׁנָ֥ה <WH8141> hash-sha-Nah year הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖ית <WH7637> hash-she-vi-'It the seventh וּמַשָּׁ֥א <WH4855> u-mash-Sha and the exaction כָל־ <WH3605> chol of every יָֽד׃ <WH3027> Yad. of every debt

וְהֶעֱמַ֤דְנוּ <WH5975> ve-he-'e-Mad-nu Also we made עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu under מִצְוֹ֔ת <WH4687> mitz-Vot, ordinances לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> la-Tet for us to charge עָלֵ֛ינוּ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu under שְׁלִשִׁ֥ית <WH7992> she-li-Shit with the third part הַשֶּׁ֖קֶל <WH8255> hash-She-kel of a shekel בַּשָּׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> bash-sha-Nah; ourselves yearly לַעֲבֹדַ֖ת <WH5656> la-'a-vo-Dat for the service בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit of the house אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu. of our God

לְלֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> le-Le-chem bread הַֽמַּעֲרֶ֡כֶת <WH4635> ham-ma-'a-Re-chet row וּמִנְחַ֣ת <WH4503> u-min-Chat meat offering הַתָּמִ֣יד <WH8548> hat-ta-Mid and for the continual וּלְעוֹלַ֣ת <WH5930> u-le-'o-Lat burnt offering הַ֠תָּמִיד <WH8548> Hat-ta-mid and for the continual הַשַּׁבָּת֨וֹת <WH7676> hash-shab-ba-Tot of the sabbaths הֶחֳדָשִׁ֜ים <WH2320> he-cho-da-Shim of the new moons לַמּוֹעֲדִ֗ים <WH4150> lam-mo-'a-Dim, for the set feasts וְלַקֳּדָשִׁים֙ <WH6944> ve-lak-ko-da-Shim and for the holy וְלַ֣חַטָּא֔וֹת <WH2403> ve-La-chat-ta-'ot, [things] and for the sin offerings לְכַפֵּ֖ר <WH3722> le-chap-Per to make an atonement עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- for יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; for Israel וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> ve-Chol and all מְלֶ֥אכֶת <WH4399> me-Le-chet and [for] all the work בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- of the house אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu. of our God ס sa-Mek

וְהַגּוֹרָל֨וֹת <WH1486> ve-hag-go-ra-Lot the lots הִפַּ֜לְנוּ <WH5307> hip-Pal-nu And we cast עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- for קֻרְבַּ֣ן <WH7133> kur-Ban offering הָעֵצִ֗ים <WH6086> ha-'e-Tzim, for the wood הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim among the priests הַלְוִיִּם֮ <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim the Levites וְהָעָם֒ <WH5971> ve-ha-'Am and the people לְ֠הָבִיא <WH935> Le-ha-vi to bring לְבֵ֨ית <WH1004> le-Veit [it] into the house אֱלֹהֵ֧ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu of our God לְבֵית־ <WH1004> le-veit- after the houses אֲבֹתֵ֛ינוּ <WH1> 'a-vo-Tei-nu of our fathers לְעִתִּ֥ים <WH6256> le-'it-Tim at times מְזֻמָּנִ֖ים <WH2163> me-zum-ma-Nim appointed שָׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> sha-Nah year בְשָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> ve-sha-Nah; by year לְבַעֵ֗ר <WH1197> le-va-'Er, to burn עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on מִזְבַּח֙ <WH4196> miz-Bach upon the altar יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, our God כַּכָּת֖וּב <WH3789> kak-ka-Tuv as [it is] written בַּתּוֹרָֽה׃ <WH8451> bat-to-Rah. in the law

וּלְהָבִ֞יא <WH935> u-le-ha-Vi And to bring אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בִּכּוּרֵ֣י <WH1061> bik-ku-Rei the firstfruits אַדְמָתֵ֗נוּ <WH127> 'ad-ma-Te-nu, of our ground וּבִכּוּרֵ֛י <WH1061> u-vik-ku-Rei and the firstfruits כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- of all פְּרִ֥י <WH6529> pe-Ri of all fruit כָל־ <WH3605> chol of every עֵ֖ץ <WH6086> 'etz of all trees שָׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> sha-Nah year בְשָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> ve-sha-Nah; by year לְבֵ֖ית <WH1004> le-Veit unto the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בְּכֹר֤וֹת <WH1060> be-cho-Rot Also the firstborn בָּנֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH1121> ba-Nei-nu of our sons וּבְהֶמְתֵּ֔ינוּ <WH929> u-ve-hem-Tei-nu, and of our cattle כַּכָּת֖וּב <WH3789> kak-ka-Tuv as [it is] written בַּתּוֹרָ֑ה <WH8451> bat-to-Rah; in the law וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בְּכוֹרֵ֨י <WH1060> be-cho-Rei and the firstborn בְקָרֵ֜ינוּ <WH1241> ve-ka-Rei-nu of our herds וְצֹאנֵ֗ינוּ <WH6629> ve-tzo-Nei-nu, and of our flocks לְהָבִיא֙ <WH935> le-ha-Vi to bring לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> le-Veit to the house אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, of our God לַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> lak-Ko-ha-Nim, unto the priests הַמְשָׁרְתִ֖ים <WH8334> ham-sha-re-Tim that minister בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> be-Veit in the house אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu. of our God
